name: Chocolate Berry
description: Tart and fruity Flanders red ale and dark, creamy stout make a rich and satisfying two-ingredient cocktail with notes of caramel, chocolate, citrus, and berry.
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces Flanders red ale, like Rodenbach
4 ounces stout, like St. Ambrose Oatmeal Stout

recipeInstructions.text: Combine both beers in a Collins or highball glass and stir gently.
